column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////After a long day of traveling
column2: I was ready for two things: a solid cocktail
column3: and great food. Chicago has no shortage of excellent places to go
column4: but the bavette has always been my favorite cut of meat
column5: so I figured that was a sign. I wasn't disappointed. Excellent food (the meatloaf is dry-aged beef and pork shoulder
column7: and the wild mushrooms and brussel sprouts were cooked perfectly)
column9: and the wine list is impressive. I'd happily return to Bavette.
